the year 1797 to the year 1816 
3dly <s>from<\s> the registers 
of eight Barometers kept 
in as many different 
& remote parts of Europe 
from the year 1781 to the 
year 1792 -
The second fact rests 
1st upon my own experiments;
in which by exposing mercury 
which had long been 
agitated with moist air 
to the <u>vacuum<\u> of an 
air-pump no air was 
disengaged from it -
2dly upon the perfectly conclusive 
experiments of Signr Bellani 
who displaced the mercury 
from a well boiled Barometer 
by means of mercury which 
had been long exposed to 
air & moisture without affecting
